item.title: How to Ace Your Job Interview in Sri Lanka
item.description: Master the art of job interviews with culturally aware strategies tailored for the Sri Lankan job market.
item.author: editorial@jobportal.lk (Career Expert Team)
item.content:encoded:
Job interviews in Sri Lanka emphasise respect, preparation and cultural fit. Learn structured answer techniques and employer expectations.

  • Punctuality & professional etiquette
  • STAR method application
  • Local employer priorities

item.title: Top 10 In-Demand Skills in Sri Lanka 2025

item.author: editorial@jobportal.lk (Industry Analyst)

Cloud, data literacy, AI adoption, cybersecurity basics and stakeholder communication lead the 2025 priority list.

Pair one technical and one soft skill for balanced growth.
